attributes.action: make being a member of the 'RATM for christmas number one' facebook group and then NOT buying the record between the 13th and 19th of December 2009 punishable by law.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Noone likes fools within their groups;

Make being a member of the 'RATM for christmas number one' facebook group and then NOT buying the record between the 13th and 19th of December 2009 punishable by law.

rejection.details: Your petition is no longer relevant.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
